original_text: Some foreign people were travelling with the Israelites. Those people wanted very much to eat better food. So the Israelites wept again. They said, ‘We want meat to eat!
korean_text: 그들 중에 섞여 사는 다른 인종들이 탐욕을 품으매 이스라엘 자손도 다시 울며 이르되 누가 우리에게 고기를 주어 먹게 하랴

sentences.original_text: Some foreign people were travelling with the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이방 사람들이 이스라엘 백성과 함께 여행하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Those people wanted very much to eat better food.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 더 나은 음식을 먹기를 매우 원했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They said, 'We want meat to eat!'
